ComicInfo.Title: Destiny's Child Part 1; Power Surge
ComicInfo.Summary:
Malikai thinks about the changes in his life.
Aspen, Finn, and Chance try to get to the ocean despite the panic caused by the blue.
A flying girl is attacked by a flying man.
Iris is spying on a man who betrayed the trust of her employer.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 02:24:50. [Issue ID 627059]
